content.question: Which of the following scenarios is an example of cogeneration?

choices.label: Using dishwashing liquid and bacteria to clean up oil spills
Using electricity to cool a house and releasing the heat into the atmosphere
Using two alternative energy sources to produce electricity for a city
Using the steam given off from a coal-fired electrical generation plant to heat nearby buildings

content.answer: Using the steam given off from a coal-fired electrical generation plant to heat nearby buildings
